LINKEDIN INDEED IMDB

Grant Girls

A sizzle reel I was hired on contract to shoot and edit, about former NBA player, his daughters and his ex-wife.

Life of Logic

We shot a pilot with the rapper Logic for an MTV show. The show was picked up, but Logic turned down the deal, supposedly because he decided he didn't want the extra scrutiny on his personal life. Not long after that he and his first wife got divorced.

It Girls

I went to Sao Paulo on behalf of Sony Pictures International to help produce two separate pilots. I was able to pick up some Portuguese. I helped them cut the presentation for the show they were calling "It Girls."

Dark Room Productions Sizzle Reel

This was a sizzle reel I cut as a promotional reel for my erstwhile production company, Dark Room Productions. It features clips from various projects I worked on as an editor and producer.

Keala Kennelly's
Slamnesia

We shot a series for digital around this woman's quest to ride the biggest waves in the world.

Monique
Wedding Dress Designer

Shot a pilot about famed wedding dress designer Monique L'huillier.
